name: Thief's Dreams
description:
Thief’s Dreams is a 3D game made for the Games Factory Jam 5. A high-tech weapon has been stolen, and the suspect won’t reveal the location. Delve into her dreams and try to find clues to the weapon’s location.

Download information

Download project, unzip and double click on project file to play. 

Controls

WASD to move around

E to interact/open doors

Mouse to look around
